title: U.S. to Sanction Two Russian Financial Institutions, Sovereign Debt, Elites and Family Members, Biden Says
sub_head: More sanctions to follow if Russian invasion continues, president says
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden said the U.S. would impose sanctions on two Russian financial institutions, its sovereign debt and elite individuals, calling Moscow’s movement of troops into Ukraine’s eastern Donbas region an invasion and warning of additional economic penalties if President Vladimir Putinwidens the incursion.
“This is the beginning of a Russian invasion of Ukraine,” Mr. Biden said Tuesday at the White House. He said Mr. Putin’s moves are a “flagrant violation of international law” and that the international community should respond firmly.
